title: Southern California’s 405 Traffic Experiment
sub_head: It’s a local laboratory well-designed for the study of jams.
body:
“The Numbers: Slowing Down Can Speed Up Traffic” (U.S. News, June 11) was a bit of useful education for this high-mileage Southern California driver and science geek. Readers learned about the mechanisms underlying our daily misery.
Allow me to contribute my own observations from the Interstate 405 Collider, a local laboratory well-designed for the study of traffic jams.
